preferred_speed.description: Default preferred speed of the character.

maximum_speed.description: Default maximum speed of the character.

fire_avoidance.description: A value of how afraid this character is of fire.

boids_cohesion_strength.description: A multiplier on the cohesion velocity vector. (0 means no cohesion)

boids_optimal_distance.description: Distance between edges of neighboring ais where they are satisfied. (It won't use cohesion to get closer to the neighbor)

boids_view_radius.description: Neighbors (roots) within view-radius meters of my root will be part of my cohesion calculation.

sensor_aabb.description: A character's sensor AABB is expressed in world axes, relative to the character position.

default_mode.description: Default ai character mode this character spawns with.

modulate_movespeed_on_turns.description: [bool]If on, this character will lower it's movespeed based on angle to wanted direction (slowing down if wanted rotation is far from current).
